Pre-Game Insights: The Los Angeles Angels have a strong home record and are expected to perform well in front of their home crowd.
The Chicago White Sox are struggling on the road and have not performed well in their previous games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first meeting between the Los Angeles Angels and the Chicago White Sox in the 2024 season.
Others: Key players to watch include Andrew Vaughn and Andrew Benintendi for the White Sox, and Taylor Ward for the Angels.
Several players are on the injured list for both teams, which could impact the game.
